title: Has an idea really made it out of here?...
body: Or am I missing the point of this part of the boards? Is it mostly just a fan art section? o-o

replies.body: Rossy is an optimist. Nobody even bothers to look at idea in reddit... no matter what people say. In support team they are like "omg why you waste time in reddit, better do it on the Na boards because its literally the only place they will actually see even if the chance is 1 out of 100000" and ofc then they told me "But you should post your stuff on all boards, just because we see you like posting and posting on 1000 different boards is fun"... I'm just rephrasing, that's not literally what they said ,but pretty much that. x]

Riot does somewhat look at the boards, but the best actual way to get riot's attention is to actually go on reddit.


(most people just haven't realized that yet is all.)
